column5: Hi All, this is a great website for a lot of fishing information. I am looking for a website that specifically gives fishing reports for the lake huron, lake erie, and st. clair river & lake.  Thanks for your help.  Bing
....You can try here Bing, you must register first though.

I find this one good for western lake Erie and Detroit river as well as Saint Clair and Mitchells bay.  http://www.basshavencanada.com/  This one also has some on those areas as well as Eastern lake Erie.  http://www.longpoint.on.ca/forum/default.asp
